comment: We just learned about place values now we know about the units place tens place hundreds place and so on ad infinitum  But what about all the fractions we learned about  Going back to the pizza say they are cut into ten slices what if we have one and one teeth pizzas is there a way to repersent that without having to use a improper fraction or mixed number  There certainly is all we have to do is extend the place values we know to repersent these  Fractions of one as well   This is achieved with the decimal point   I understand now   The decimal point is to talk about exactness in a single number sense big things made of small thing would be counted as 1 but if it was split it would be a point of something   3.5+1.1=4.6✅️  6.5-2.2 = 4.3✅️  0.7 + 5.2 = 5.9✅️  9.7-9.5=0.3✅️

Im going in 9th grade stuck on a 5th grade math level due to "homeschool" not being Homeschool. im going into public very soon and am definitely eager to catch myself up as far as i can beforehand. This isn't as difficult as I'd imagined. Props to this man. 🎉
